original_text: The 24 leaders were sitting on their thrones in front of God. Now they threw themselves down on their faces and they worshipped God.
korean_text: 하나님 앞에서 자기 보좌에 앉아 있던 이십사 장로가 엎드려 얼굴을 땅에 대고 하나님께 경배하여

sentences.original_text: The 24 leaders were sitting on their thrones
Now they threw themselves down on their faces
